mapper.select:
SELECT t.pointname,t.DATATIME,GROUP_CONCAT(t.POLLUTENAME SEPARATOR '|') as POLLUTENAME,GROUP_CONCAT(t.SUNIT SEPARATOR '|') as SUNIT, GROUP_CONCAT(t.DATAVALUE SEPARATOR '|') AS DATAVALUES,t.CATEGORYNAME AS DATATYPENAME FROM ( SELECT B.POINTNAME, E.REGIONNAME, F.POLLUTENAME, SUBSTR(A.DATATIME,1,16) DATATIME, A.DATAVALUE, B.SUNIT, B.SMINVALUE, B.SMAXVALUE, G.CATEGORYNAME FROM (${RTTable}) A LEFT JOIN V_BAS_POLLSTD B ON B.POINTCODE = A.POINTCODE AND B.POLLUTECODE=A.POLLUTECODE AND B.SYSTEMTYPE =#{systemType} LEFT JOIN T_DIC_AREACODE E ON E.CODE_REGION=B.REGIONCODE LEFT JOIN T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE F ON F.POLLUTECODE=A.POLLUTECODE LEFT JOIN T_DIC_GENERALCATEGORY G ON G.CATEGORYCLASS ='dataType' AND G.GENERALCODE=#{dataType} WHERE A.DATATIME >=#{startTime} AND A.DATATIME <=#{endTime} AND ( A.DATAVALUE >= B.SMAXVALUE OR A.DATAVALUE <= B.SMINVALUE )
AND A.POINTCODE IN
#{item}
ORDER BY A.POINTCODE,A.DATATIME,A.POLLUTECODE ASC ) t GROUP BY t.pointname,t.DATATIME
